name: classtrim
description: Automatically removes extra whitespace from className and class attributes in React/JSX and HTML files. Trims leading and trailing spaces and normalizes multiple spaces to single spaces on save.

classtrim.formatOnSave.description: Enable/disable formatting when a file is saved.

classtrim.targetLanguages.description: List of language identifiers to apply formatting to.

classtrim.requiredPathSegment.description: A directory name that must be in the file's path (e.g., 'src'). Leave empty to allow any path.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
